headline: Exclusive: Equipment Problem Knocks Espresso Drinks off McDonald’s Menu
summary: If you're headed to McDonald's for a caramel macchiato or iced French vanilla latte, you may be waiting a while.  The manufacturer behind many of the chain’s U.S. espresso makers, Melitta, told restaurant operators in a letter Monday that it is investigating a faulty component.  Melitta advised operators to stop using the machines for up to three weeks while it investigates the issue, and inspects the machines.

headline: How I Repurposed My Late Father's Trust Account
summary: I restructured my father's Trust for better diversification and risk reduction. See why I reduced Health Care and Consumer stocks and shifted to new sectors.
